title: IIFA AWARDS puts Lanka on top of world tourism map
content: Sunday Observer – By Shirajiv SIRIMANE – (Pix: Reuters) The country will be reputed as one of the best Meeting, Incentive, Conference and Exhibitions (MICE) destinations when Sri Lanka hosts the eleventh edition of the IIFA Indian International Film Awards from June 3 to 5. The Sunday Observer is the official print media sponsor. The…
